title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 81.1 - Application requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 81.1 - Application requirements

State Regulations
(a) A
labor organization desiring to register and file with the Department of Labor
any device adopted for the purpose of designating the product of the labor of
its members shall make application on a form supplied by the Industrial

Commissioner. Together with the application, the labor organization shall
submit three copies of the device of the same size as is used on or in
connection with the goods, wares or merchandise worked on or produced by the
members of the labor organization and three photostatic enlargements thereof
five inches by seven inches. All six copies, both enlarged and unenlarged, wherever possible, should be pasted on or attached to separate sheets of white
paper 81/2 inches by 11 inches. (b) The president or chief executive officer or the secretary of the labor
organization shall sign the application. (c) The application must be accompanied by a
non-refundable filing fee of $10. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
81.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
